describe: Andorra is a small, mountainous country located in the Pyrenees mountains between France and Spain. Known for its ski resorts, duty-free shopping, and beautiful landscapes, Andorra is a popular tourist destination.

cities.name: üèô Andorra la Vella
cities.geographical_location: Located in the eastern Pyrenees mountains, it is the capital city of Andorra.
cities.climate: Andorra la Vella has an oceanic climate, with cold, snowy winters and mild summers.
